quest.name: Heroic Reprise
journal: Fray is pleased to see you, as always.
Fray knows you have not heard the voice in some time, and so shehe hopes to help you as shehe did before. Join herhim in eastern Thanalan and prepare for communion.
It begins, as always, with an offering of blood. Seek out and slay axe beaks. Fray is watching.
Something is lacking, but you cannot say what. Well, it is done. Perhaps Fray will be satisfied.

A flicker of annoyance spasms across your face. How pointless, you think, and Fray smiles, for shehe knows your heart. Remember this feeling. Treasure it. It will serve you well in your next communion in Camp Drybone.

How dare Isembard interrupt our communion! As if pilgrims have not been kidnapped before! Yet here you are again, forced to risk life and limb to rescue fools who should have armed themselves. All because there is no one else. So be it. Raid the Amalj'aa encampment and rescue the prisoners.

Fortunately, Amalj'aa are far better sport than peistes, eh!? And the beastmen were happy to keep coming, howling with rage for their fallen kin, no matter how many you slew! Fray's chuckling is infectious, and you find yourself sharing herhis grin.
Fray suggests you refrain from cleaning the blood from your equipment. Let Isembard see what you accomplished firsthand.
Isembard's eyes wander to the bloodstains, only to flee a moment later. You can hear the fear in his voice as he thanks you for saving the pilgrims. Fray ought to find that amusing.
Those who have never known true sacrifice quake at the sight of it. You know this because Fray knows this. Extend your hand and prepare for communion.

“Serve... Save... Slave... Slay...” The voice drones on, each word resounding in your heart as the tapping of hammer and chisel. “Sacrifice is to renounce that which binds you,” Fray says. “To recognize that which matters─and forsake all that does not.” Serve... Save... Slave... Slay... Fray knows you cannot continue to carry all these burdens. Heed herhis warning, before it is too late.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Fray upon reaching level 45.
objectives: Rendezvous with Fray at the Burning Wall.
Commune with Fray in Camp Drybone.
Rendezvous with Fray at the Amalj'aa encampment.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You look well, Forename. More determined.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You have not heard the voice since last we spoke. I know. But worry not.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: If your affinity with your darkside is as strong as I believe, then communion is all you require.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Come with me to the Burning Wall. You know what you must do.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: It begins, as always, with blood. A confirmation of your identity.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: There are axe beaks here which have grown ferocious beyond reckoning. Vile creatures, eager to prey on man and beast alike.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Offer yourself to them. They will come.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Then make an offering of them to me.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: No more words, Forename.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Ahhh, now that is the Forename I've longed to see!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You resent this, don't you? This “pointless” trial.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Perhaps you even resent me for subjecting you to it.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Remember this feeling. Treasure it. I want it smoldering within you when we commune in Camp Drybone.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Close your eyes and hold out your hand towards me. Breathe deep through your nose─let the air fill your lungs, then let it pass from your lips. Slower, slower...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Listen to my voice. Listen to your heartbeat. Listen for the other...

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: (-???-)Thank the Twelve, it is you! Forename!

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Isembard, remember? It must have been ages since last we spoke!

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: To think that you would end up slaying the Lord of the Inferno! When you first came through looking for our missing commonfolk, I took you for a─

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Ah, but this isn't the time to reminisce! I sought you out because I need your help!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...Do tell.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Not long ago, an Amalj'aa raiding party attacked a caravan on the road and abducted several pilgrims!

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: We reported the incident to both the Brass Blades and the Immortal Flames, but it seems neither is in a position to muster forces at present.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: You know what lies in store should they not be rescued soon. Please, Forename─there is no one else!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Really? Charge into an enemy encampment filled with Amalj'aa warriors and free some fools who should've armed themselves!?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Risk life and limb to do the work of a dozen men all because you bloody asked!? Is that it!?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: That's what we do.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: What choice do we have?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But that's what we do, isn't it? Every godsdamned time. Fine. We'll bring them back.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But what choice do we have, eh? Like you said─there's no one else. We'll bring them back.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: I...I... Thank you for... They were bound for the encampment to the southeast...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Then so are we.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: They...they were bound for the encampment to the southeast...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The nerve of some people, after all you do for them...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: They're inside, just as Isembard said. Mere moments away from being tempered, I'm sure.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Well, what are you waiting for? It's time to play the hero!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Heh heh, just didn't know when to leave off, did they?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Neither did you though, eh? I mean, look at yourself. Most of that's not even your blood!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Leave it. You've nothing to be ashamed of.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Let's go and give Isembard the good news.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Isembard ought to know what you did. Show him.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: W-Welcome back, Forename! I heard you really gave those Amalj'aa what for! G-Good show!

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: I'm sure you're eager to be on your way, so I won't waste any more of your time...but th-thank you! Come back whenever you like!

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: We're fine, Forename! No need to linger on our account! Pray be on your way!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Those who have never faced death do not scruple to condemn others to it. They know nothing of true sacrifice, and are weak for their ignorance.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: In sacrifice there is strength. In sacrifice there is liberation.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Close your eyes and hold out your hand towards me. Breathe deep through your nose─let the air fill your lungs, then let it pass from your lips. Slower, slower...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With every breath you grow lighter and slip further into the abyss...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)On a throne of bone shehe waits...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text:
(-???-)Serve... Save... Slave... Slay...
They come to entreat herhis judgment...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text:
(-???-)Serve... Save... Slave... Slay...
One by one, in solemn procession...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...So. What did you hear this time?

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Hm. And there I was thinking you were on the verge of discerning the truth...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Your affinity with your darkside grows stronger by the day. And yet...there is a hesitation.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Listen to me, Forename. You have performed great deeds and saved countless people. You are a hero to the realm...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: But you are no dark knight.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: A dark knight accepts that shehe cannot save everyone─that sometimes, shehe is fortunate just to save herselfhimself.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Sacrifice, Forename, is to renounce that which binds you. To recognize that which matters─and forsake all that does not.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: At the very least, you must realize that you cannot continue to carry all these burdens...

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Unless you wish to die a slave.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: ...I'm fine, just a little...just a little tired.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: The communion is ended, and with it, our time together. But we shall meet again, as we did before.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: They're not far ahead. Lead the way.

dialogue.name: RESCUE1
dialogue.text: Gods bless you, adventurer!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Keep moving! We're not free just yet!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Of course there's more. There's always more.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER
dialogue.text: Rally! Do not let herhim escape!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Run! Get yourselves to Camp Drybone!

dialogue.name: BOSS
dialogue.text: You will pay for your insolence!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: Oh, what a day! What a lovely day!

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: I've had my fill. Let's go.

dialogue.name: FRAY
dialogue.text: You think this is it!? You think this ends with me!?

dialogue.name: RESCUE1
dialogue.text: No... No!

dialogue.name: RESCUE2
dialogue.text: I...I can't...

dialogue.name: RESCUE3
dialogue.text: I think I need to sit down...
